title: The Dream Dilemma: Reflections of EL
description: Find your way through a dream and fulfill all your needsDeidre has been having disturbing dreams. At times, they even appear to be visions of the future. She wishes nothing but the best for her sister Kelly and her new husband, Dyllon, but the night time excursions always seem to revolve around the recent groom.  Add to this mix, a dark force that is actually directing Deidre's dreams for its own agenda. Things are not always what they seem in this story of love and hope which picks up where book one left off.
author: Lloyd A. Green
